website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy steel frame and tempered glass surface for a great price.
pros: Straightforward assembly and a modifiable design make this a great battlestation desk for any gamer
It looks great, and it allows for an organized setup
cons: Cannot support a tower on the glass surface

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. However
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. However, DO NOT put your gaming tower on these GLASS tops. They will break and your pc will go down. Use your imagination of loss in damage vs just putting your tower either on the ground or somewhere sturdy and secure. Yes I've seen pictures of people's review here putting his or her tower in the corner section but I've also seen on Reddit broken pcs falling from glass tops breaking. I don't know about you but I don't have a spare $1,000 usd sitting around waiting to hit the ground. Again, great and easy table, just don't go crazy thinking a glass top will support a 40lb-60lb tower.
customer_reviews.author: uili kaveinga

customer_reviews.title: EXPLODING GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a zero if I could. I was trying to clean it and it exploded in my face.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy

customer_reviews.title: Library Card too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I was across the house when I hear a crash. After investigating each room I find this. There was minimal weight for this glass pull out shelf. I have had this desk for under 2 years. Never once did I use this keyboard shelf as a work bench for welding, sawing, scrimshawing, or surgery . The only explanation for this rapid explosion of glass is those two library cards must contain the mass of a black hole. On a good note, I did discover my glass break sensors for my security system are faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Wray

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE This Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this desk! I own a small multi level condo. Since my one and only guest room is used as a walk-in closet/fitness room, I had no where else to put a desk but in my dining room. So I wanted something less conspicuous, especially with the size of my monitor and desktop computer. It came packaged very well. My boyfriend assembled the desk and said it was very easy to do so. It isn’t the most sturdy if you push on it from side to side. However, for what I use it for it doesn’t wobble. I love it’s clean lines and modern appearance, and doesn’t draw too much attention where it’s placed.
customer_reviews.author: Miliama

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this desk
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this desk. Assembly isn't that bad considering the fact that I am a 15 year old girl, it maybe took me 45 minutes. I feel completely confident with resting my arms on it and it does not wobble at all. Keep in mind that the corner is curved so it won't be right against the wall, but I have no problem with that. I plan on using one side as a vanity and the other as a school work place. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great desk for the price. was able to setup in less than an hour, pieces clearly marked to help with assembly. Liked the frosted glass, added lighting on underside to give my son a nice look while he games. Keyboard tray little sticky but freed up quickly after little use. Don't think it was a product issue just new tight fit. designed to have keyboard tray on either side depending on room placement. Below is $20 light kit i used to get multi color accent.
customer_reviews.author: YouBcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Exploding glass, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly if i could give no star I would. At first I loves this desk. My office is small and having the glass tops made the room look bigger. However!! After having the desk for just over a year one of the glass pieces exploded sending glass pieces all over my office - while I was sitting there!! I had to throw away a rug, tear apart my office to clean all the glass pieces and had small cuts on my leg from the exploding glass. I DO NOT recommend this desk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it. Warranty is 30 days for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: Don't do it. Desk shattered in the middle of the night and no my laptop wasn't turned on so it cannot be due to heat, I haven't even used the desk in weeks. The warranty is 30 days for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Keshia

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles.  Requires DIY support.  See picture.
customer_reviews.text: This desk was designed for an "L" shape desk, but they decided to sell this separately (I have both so I know). Problem is without the other pieces this desk wobbles left and right even without anything on top. I can't imagine anyone putting a monitor or any weight on top it. Unless you buy the three piece "L" shape desk, I would not recommend buying this solo piece on its own. I did some DIY solution and added support to the bottom. Now the desk is SOLID. Cost me no more than $10 for material. It doesn't look as nice, but what good is a good looking desk that doesn't work?
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great but dimensions are wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to put together. Only thing is that it’s twice the size shown. The dimensions are for only half of the U.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent look for an excellent price. Came one day early as well. Packaging was horrendous, but nothing broken. Assembly was not difficult, just time consuming. I love it! Worth every penny in my opinion. Was looking for a minimalist glass desk, and that's what I got!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan S

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so after thoroughly reading the review - I decided on this particular desk with the smoke glass. First, the packaging: I had read that there was a lot of Styrofoam, so I was prepared. I opened the box and took it all out later by layer, bagging the Styrofoam as I went. The mess was minimal thanks to other reviewers :) I found the instructions to be very understandable, all parts clearly marked, and nothing missing. I made two mistakes because I missed clear steps in the instructions, but both were very easy to fix because the product is made such that the bolts can be unscrewed again without stripping.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Oltmanns

customer_reviews.title: There are some likes and dislikes
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I do love it, just a few dislikes. I will start off with the likes. I like that it doesn't take up much space. Being it is in my foyer I love that it looks sleek and clean. Now on to the dislikes if you can see in the picture there is no and I mean no room for your legs to go under the keyboard tray if you want to cross them. The keyboard tray does not fully pull out so not much room there either. And last but not least the middle piece looks a but unfinished. Idk maybe I'm just being picky, but over all I really do like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Adams

customer_reviews.title: A great value desk
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy, it was hard to figure out the correct direction of some pieces from the drawings so I had to backtrack once. Overall it wasn't complicated and it's a stable desk that looks great. It is quite the dust magnet though, I have never been such a neat freak cleaning it several times a day thanks to my cat. I didn't factor in that the bar at the bottom limits leg room so my under desk elliptical doesn't fit, my bad for not looking more carefully. The keyboard tray sometimes gets stuck and I struggle to close it all the way but otherwiseiIt gets the job done well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love how it turned out! I had difficulty putting together the keyboard tray. However, I’m not the type to build my own furniture. At all. But I was so excited and determined to get it right. The instructions were easy to follow on my own, other than the issue I had with the keyboard tray. Could be user error though. It took me about an hour and a half to finish and that was with some 2-3 minute breaks in between to check text messages lol
customer_reviews.author: Javona Smith

customer_reviews.title: Our issues with this one desk out of 4 that we ordered were never resolved
customer_reviews.text: The glass for this desk does not fit in nicely because there is a defect in it and we cannot fix it ourselves because it is an issue with how it was meld together. The glass therefore does not fit snugly in the frame making it a bit of a hazard. We were told to contact the manufacturer on this and then were told by the manufacturer that it really should be Amazon who should be assisting us with a credit. We have been longtime Amazon customers and we are hopeful for a resolution as they have always been good in solving any issues we have with the products on their website. Thank you in advance. Nicole
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is two desks!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fair warning, the dimensions in the description is for only one desk, you have to double it. So it was twice as large as expected, but it is a really great desk. You will need a desk pad to use with an optical mouse....
customer_reviews.author: Dale Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have an L Shaped desk like this in my office I got more than 10 years ago from an office supply store that doesn't even exist any more, that cost three times as much, this one is a bit lighter but is pretty sturdy and went together a lot easier. Time will tell if it holds up, but all in all it was a good purchase and seems to be more than capable for daily work. Got it right before everything happened so it's seen daily use and has held up really well! Have to say if buy another one if we needed to just based on how easy it was and the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gilman

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if this is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap materials is my biggest complaint. The legs and supports are all cheap aluminum. The measurements they provide are not accurate at all. If you have legs, the keyboard tray can't be used because it is way too low. I set up the desk and that was the first thing I had to uninstall so I could sit under the desk. None of the glass lines up so it desktop is very uneven and none of the corners line up so it looks very sloppy. The assembly was easy so I guess that earns it a star and the price earns it a star but everything else costs it the other 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say company does an amazingly good job of packing the furniture for shipment. It is always a bit dicey ordering furniture with glass tops for shipment to my home. Likely hood for broken glass tops are high. This came with each piece individually wrapped in paper plastic and styrofoam. Really appreciated that. The furniture was easy enough to assemble with clear instructions and looked great when finished. Very happy with the quality of this furniture for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Skymom

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard tray is useless
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty but it lacks certain structural integrity and has severe design flaws. DO NOT trust the kayboard tray glass suction cups. They WILL NOT hold it in place and the glass WILL fall through the hole. The first time it dropped through the tray holder, it almost broke my foot. The second time, it broke a key off of my 150 dollar mechanical keyboard. Garbage engineering and design.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Great desk if you get your brackets!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible picture but I love this desk only complaint is mine came with no brackets for my keyboard. Amazon was wonderful with customer service but this company has not; it’s been over a month no response from the company I was told it’d take 3 weeks and was ok with that but not a word.. :( Updated Review: So instead of receiving the brackets, I received a whole new desk! Over the top customer care! Great desk plenty of room, super easy installation as well. I’m removing my negative experience as this was always a 5/5 even without the brackets, but atlas my desk is complete. I’m 5”11 btw plenty of room under the desk in case people were interested.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking desk with the tempered glass design. The glass doesn't seem to be easily scratched and it is easy to clean with a wet piece of cloth. The tray opens out enough for me to access the F keys on top of my keyboard. My only problem with this desk that would make it a 5 star for me is having some sort of cable management option because it comes with a small place to put your PC tower, but no cable management. If it would have a small section on the desk that would allow cables to run through that would have been perfect for organising my cables.
customer_reviews.author: Winged Demsar

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp, easy to assemble - a bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this since I’ll be working from home for a while longer and wanted to vacate the dining room table. This desk is perfectly sized for my large (27”) monitor - I took a spot at our bedroom window but didn’t want to dominate the space. It’s basically like a small school desk and the drawer enables me to “hide” the keyboard and keep some desk space. The only issue is that it wiggles as you type or do anything physical (like move the mouse). The rocking is slight, but noticeable. Not a major issue but I’d like it to be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: A.I.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office because I use four monitors and need quite a bit of space. This desk is not only beautiful but it's sturdy. this was an amazing value for the price! I have absolutely zero regrets and the glass looks gorgeous in my office space.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. Better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: After a 1 year of use one of the glass partitions no longer fits. The desk has become very wobbly. It is SUCH A PIECE OF JUNK I'm going to literally throw it away and find something better. I wouldn't wish this desk on my worst enemy. It has literally NO leg room. At all. Not in the corner, not sitting to one side. The design is extremely poor. I've seen some other corner desks recently with plenty of leg room with no cross bars on the bottom. Kind of regret buying this desk now as those look a lot more comfortable to work on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer N. Jonson

customer_reviews.title: WAY EASY TO PUT TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: Only complaints are that the box arrived with the tape worn off, so it was about to pop open and spill the contents but it didn't so, no problem. Also the keyboard tray ... there's nothing holding the two drop down arms together except the keyboard tray itself so it can be a challenge to get the keyboard tray to align properly and not fall out. I intend to remedy this with a soldered arm in the back or underneath somehow. But the table is gorgeous once put together. Smoked glass looks great. Love the huge L space. The cpu holder is too small for my machine so I am going to make it into a plant stand
customer_reviews.author: Zed Linger

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: This desk was pretty easy to assemble. I put it together so the key board was on the left side and this didn't seem to make a big difference. I will say some screws were hard to get lined up but once they were set up was easy. I would suggest putting some disposable gloves on when setting up the keyboard tray as it is a little greasy. The desk is sturdy and doesn't wobble. The only issue i had was that one of the legs has a bar that was slightly bent but didn't seem to effect the overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, its a bit of a pain in the as* to assemble. It took a few tries to get it perfect (just like the reviews said). Of coarse i am one of those guys who does not read directions in detail (like most humans). But its really nice and sturdy. Priced perfectly. I would reccomend this product. I did get the covid its going to take forever to ship message right after buying this. Then it showed up in a week in a half. I almost cancelled the order due to the 6 week message. Glad i did not.
customer_reviews.author: guitarmike82

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: First day getting it and assembling it: The keyboard placement solely relies on 4 tiny suction cups that don't work. It's fallen out multiple times and landed on my feet. Everything is glass, and the edges hurt the most. I don't know how it hasn't shattered on my wood floors yet. This is a joke, will be replacing it very soon. Lastly, the "corner" of the desk is a half-circle, and doesn't really go into the corner.. It looks tacky and I can't fit much on it. Overall really disappointed. If my bloody big toe could sue it would.
customer_reviews.author: Nights

customer_reviews.title: Great little L Shaped desk.
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my necessary computer and gaming devices and if fits in my small area. Only problem I really have with it was assembly, the center wedge doesn't have a sticker saying "this side up". So had to remove and balance the desk to replace the wedge in the correct direction so the glass would fit on top. Some advice for assembly, many of the screws are very long winded. Use a screwdriver that has a hex bit that matches the hex tool they give you makes things go much quicker. Also put the keyboard tray together (no glass) with the rollers off of the main desk (4L and 4R peices). Otherwise this a fantastic desk and meets my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Focusman24

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased to find out it was packaged well with styrofoam ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time but was apprehensive about finding shattered glass inside the box. I was very pleased to find out it was packaged well with styrofoam and there was no breakage in the product. Instructions were easy to follow and setting it up was a breeze! The desk is nice and clean looking (I chose white) but wished it was wider to accommodate 2 monitors and a keyboard. I put the desk in the corner of the room so the wires and connections are better managed. I am happy with my purchase and did not regret getting this over another L shaped desk with a pull out keyboard tray.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Glass gets dirty, cabling is chaos.
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk - glass needs cleaning a lot. Mouse needs a pad. Cabling is seen unless tie wrapped. No drawers of course. All of these things need to be considered.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kay (Chicago, Il USA))

customer_reviews.title: Very cool looking desk! Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking desk! Easy to put together though the instructions could have been a bit clearer on certain parts Especially the parts explaining which side is up for the corner piece and how to assemble the keyboard holder, those required me to disassemble/ reassemble multiple times to figure it out by trial and error. Seems sturdy and looks great in my room. Can't really store anything under the desk though, due to the slanted angle of the supports.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard tray doesn't fit into its tracks - too small
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to put together. The tracks for the keyboard tray were too far apart so I don't even use that part so it's a waste as a computer desk for me. It just sits in the corner as a bill area. Very disappointed. I would've returned it but didn't want to bother with taking it apart and was thinking of using ties to keep the tray on, but I never did. Not too sturdy either, which is why it's just a bill desk and not a study desk - a book or two and writing would make this desk shake around.
customer_reviews.author: Joy King

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in 2014 and still my primary desk
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I would absolutely recommend this product. I'm looking to upgrade my desk now, but when I purchased it I needed something compact, relatively strong, and decent looking. This fit the bill perfectly, especially for a little over $100. Do not expect this to be an executive style desk with heaps of space. Understand its limitations and determine if it's what you need. The only con I have is the double bar running horizontally does block my legs from fully stretching out occasionally but I think I'm unique in how much I value full leg extension room. Many reviewers have had no issue with it so I wouldn't say it's enough to rate 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R

customer_reviews.title: Grease, Grease Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The sliding drawer will get the grease on your hands, then on everything else. If you put the slide bars on backwards, which it lets you! You can no longer easily unlock them if they are backwards (still working on this now) and I might not get to use this feature. In summary, wear old cloths and have some sort of de-greaser on hand to clean up everything. Looks great but no the sturdiest thing out there for sure. Was going to order a matching set, now looking at something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! Should cost more for the quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and folks said it was hard to put together. My husband had this desk together I less than 25 minutes. Only issue he had was a few screws were stripped? Other than that this desk is GAWJUS! STURDY!!!! Should be more expensive in my opinion! Came on time! Just downright awesome! I have run my business from my bedroom and dining room. It’s nice to have a desk now and a classy one!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk, it's exactly what I wanted. Just a tip though... The keyboard tray track you need to take apart to attach it and it's greased up so maybe wear latex gloves. I (wrongly) assumed I wouldn't get too much on my hands and it was a mess haha Also make sure the holes for the suction cups are facing upwards. I chalk that up to me smoking prior to assembly. Please learn from my mistakes. Even with me being stoned and not following directions it went together easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and functional glass top desk. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking and sleek desk, well built, has wobble or shakiness to it. Holds all the weight I can pile on it which at the moment is a laptop riser with a fan, a PS4 Pro, an X1X, Keyboard/mouse, Mix amp, 2 headsets, 2 mouse large pads, a 27" monitor, webcam, capture card, and my forearms! My only real gripe is the lack of cable management options. You can rearrange the pieces to make a long desk if you'd like. Solid option. Worth a buy.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyDewy

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, pain in the neck
customer_reviews.text: I would avoid this desk. I needed two inexpensive desks when we moved. I got my wife the Origami RDE-01 Computer Desk from Amazon. Folds out and snaps together. No tools needed. Easy peasy, and a good, solid desk. I got this Walker Edison, a little bigger, for me. But it had 19 pieces and 58 screws and bolts. Plus the package was missing 6 pieces. Walker Evans refused to send me the 6 missing pieces weighting about a pound, so I had to ship back the entire package weighing 66 pounds and wait for a second desk. This delay was a big inconvenience for me. Plus the thing was complicated to put together, easy to goof it up..
customer_reviews.author: Customer FD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming Desk
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a LOOONG time before I decided to purchase this desk. Here's how it all went: 1. Setup: Took me an hour or so due to putting things on backwards a couple times (doh!). Instructions straightforward, unlike my brain. 2. Durability: Frame feels sturdy and glass is tempered. Pretty confident about accidental bumps and knocking things over on it. 3. Height: Perfect for a 6'0" guy like myself; PLENTY of knee room. 4. Appearance: Has a sleekness to it. Definitely more appealing in person than online. 6/10 online, 9/10 in person. 5. Cord Management: Good potential for this. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase. $100 well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Socalnomadic

customer_reviews.title: Read directions and pay attention when assembling
customer_reviews.text: Assembly wasnt super clear as far as the how the tray needed to be assembled and the direction on the legs and how pieces should face. If you pay attention as you go this wont be an issue but I figured some people would like the heads up. Other than that perfect for your average user and limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The desk was very easy to assemble and looks nice. But I can only give it three stars due to two issues. The keyboard tray is too small and does not slide in and out. The slide rails do not work at all. I cannot fit my mouse and keyboard on the tray. Only the keyboard fits. The second issuer is there were mulitple broke parts. Four of the base plugs were broken leaving visible open holes in the base frame. I was able to attach two of the plugs using two sided tape, but that will most likely fail over time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Krause

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good buy. Best for compact rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Pros : - Takes little space and does not make the room look packed and clumsy. - Well built for the price. - Good leg room to let the chair in. - Light weight to move around. Cons : - No storage. - Can't place a system box within the frame. - Little tricky to assemble. Took me over an hour. - Desk is not sturdy. Can't place heavy objects on it. Overall, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Preethi

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts- otherwise beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The desk itself is gorgeous for the price! I give it 2 stars because it was missing parts. The desk requires (16) 45 mm bolts, but it arrived with (12). I’m not sure who is doing quality control over there, but it is quite frustrating to be in the midst of assembling office furniture only to realize that we didn’t receive all that we paid for!! Fortunately there’s a hardware store down the street, but we should’nt have Had to resort to that!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shev Grn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend who has been wanting an L desk for a while. Extremely great price for the quality and it looks super sleek, not an eyesore in our office like I was afraid of haha. Definitely recommend getting the glass top! Assembly took two people and some head scratching but that's because we did it opposite the directions to fit it to our space (which it's cool that you can modify it how you want/need).
customer_reviews.author: BaileyHeflin

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Love these tables I bought them as a present for my fiancé and I for Christmas to upgrade our gaming set up and they look stunning. It took about an hour for each table and was well worth it. The only awkward part is the keyboard and mouse being separate from each other. We are nubs at LED lighting but we put strips on the upper part of the keyboard tray and it looks awesome. He showed his friends his new setup and new chair and they all say how beautiful and jealous they are. If your thinking about it just go for it I’m happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product All Around.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my home office and have been using it for the past four weeks. First, delivery was better than promised, prompt and efficient. The package arrived in perfect condition no damaged or broken glass. All parts were accounted for. Assembly was reasonably easy. I would suggest looking up assembly video on you tube. I am a visual person and like to see the process. The desk is sturdy. I love the aesthetics of it. Very clean lines and minimalist. Only gave it 4 stars to see how it does over time. Will re-visit in six months. I'm hoping I can find accessories that compliment the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and functional, with a few hardware issues.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very stylish desk, but the keyboard slider was difficult to put on, the pieces didn't quite seem to fit right. It also doesnt slide out very far, making it difficult to type without pulling out the keyboard over the edge or placing your hand under the initial desktop. (Bad for the knuckles. Ouch!) The stand for the desktop lacked glass, and so it doesnt hold the tower well at all, I ended up not using it because the tower slides off at the slightest bump. Otherwise, a very nice, functional desk.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Black

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this desk for many years now and I loved it. I just upgraded to an extra large glass desk so I passed this one on to my sister but it’s still good as new. No scratches and it’s used daily with no special care taken. Slightly wobbly but I had it in a corner so it was never an issue at all. I would definitely recommend if your looking for a cheap desk that is going to look great for years to come unlike a particleboard board desk.
customer_reviews.author: Shotzie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Glass is not level after placing it. I can deal with that. However when I pay 90 dollars for a computer desk I don't expect it to come scratched all to pieces where it is noticeable. I understand some nicks but not very noticeable scratches where the paint is missing on almost every single piece.
customer_reviews.author: Aubsmommmy

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for, and this ain't bad
customer_reviews.text: This computer desk is modern, sturdy and well priced. Be prepared to get grease all over everything when installing the drawer hinges. Wear gloves, wipe the excess grease off the outside of the rollers before handling them. Id suggest having a screw gun with a phillips head bit to make assembly easier on you. I would buy this again. I didnt find instructions in the box but you should be able to just go from photos its not that difficult. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good luck making it work.
customer_reviews.text: It was not as hard as others said about the difficulty of assembling this desk. If you follow the instructions to a tee, you will have a desk that looks fine. The only problem is that the section with the slide out tray cannot be squared. The tray will not fit into the glides. No matter what you do, you cannot adjust the glass and frame to accommodate the tray. I just wasted $160.00. DO NOT BUY THIS DESK.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk, sizable enough for 3 decent sized monitors. I have a 32in and 2 22in set up comfortably. with mouse and keyboard. It was super simple to put together, all the pieces were there. Only issue I had was the allen wrench they included was just awful quality, I don't expect much from the tiny tools that come with furniture, but I do expect them to actually FIT the screws they were made for. the one i recieved was too big, luckily i have my own set so its not the worst thing in the world. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.text: While this desk is beautiful and hold everything I want, the instructions were not clear at all. Once my boyfriend got it almost put together, it then said at the end to make sure the holes were face up. This required the desk to be nearly taken all apart and put back together. It took 2 days to put together. I honestly won’t buy this again if I ever need another desk.
customer_reviews.author: lacy

customer_reviews.title: looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: Best desk I've ever had. A little concerned about putting too much weight on it. The glass is labeled tempered glass but I know from experience when buying things online it usually isn't tempered even when it is labeled that way. The keyboard holder immediately started sticking and seems like it needs to be lubed and the keyboard holder is too small for a mouse and almost to small for a full sized keyboard alone.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: new low price. works great for a smaller room..
customer_reviews.text: was considering 4 stars but i really do appreciate it a lot. Considering the price point, i had to get this and replace it with my older particle board (cancerous fake wood). the reason why i was considering giving it 4 was because the glass was dark to wear you can't see through it and the keyboard drawer could be a couple inches wider but it works fine. Another thing, I had to search online for the direction but it was no big deal at all. I assembled it by myself. Had to turn the keyboard tray around but all good.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very elegant desk, with a minimalist design. It's a great addition to any room and looks much more expensive than what the price suggests. Just to note...If you have a 27" widescreen monitor, it will take up most of your desk space. (+): Very sturdy & solid construction, glass is durable (no scratches after several months of use), solid feet, nice keyboard tray, black paint is of good quality with no chips, smudges or runs. (-): You will need a mousepad for any wireless mouse (optical, laser, blue track), assembly instructions leave a little to be desired (easy enough to setup without), keyboard rails/bearings needed extra lubricant applied because the tray didn't pull out smoothly
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap build quality
customer_reviews.text: It's obvious nobody tested this before shipping it out. The keyboard slides are covered in unnecessary grease and the build quality is atrocious. Parts don't line up and the end result is a tabletop that wobbles. It's a desk. The one thing a desk needs to do right is not wobble. The only thing preventing me from demanding a refund is the fact that it's so cheap it's not worth tearing down and packing up to ship back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome desk. First of all it took 2 days to deliver it bought it on a Saturday and came that Tuesday. Really easy to assemble. Took roughly an hour. Don’t need tools except a screwdriver for the keyboard pullout thing. That was the hardest part to install since the direction was not that great for that portion. The glass is a temper glass.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Pay Attention while assembling
customer_reviews.text: Thie is a small desk. Let's just get that out of the way. It's stylish and relatively easy to assemble. When you're putting it together don't tighten anything untill it's all standing. There are a lot of places where i had to go back and losen thngs to make the next part fit. My only other issure is that the keyboard tray is a bit shallow for my gaming keyboard and wrist rest. Other than that, A+.
customer_reviews.author: A. Berry

customer_reviews.title: great product. keyboard platform requires a little work
customer_reviews.text: This corner desk will not disappoint. Assembly is a breeze. The leg design account for unevenness using screw caps, so your desk will not rock. The desk is really nice overall. The glass surface is great for dry erase markers. However, the keyboard draw started to "jam" after a few days. Then it fell as I slid it back under the desk. The two parts containing the four rods that connect the platform to the rest of the desk can turn. If it turns outwards it will create extra room and a gap allowing the keyboard platform to fall. Tighten those two parts after you get the right distance between the two sets of rods for a smooth slide.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: 2+ Years, Still Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk to use while gaming and it's held it's strength through two apartment moves. After 2+ years of gaming, it has minor scratches and is as great as ever. My girlfriend and I disassembled the one large desk setup and moved to two smaller independent stations. I've hit the glass accidentally before a couple of times, with a cup or mug and no breaks or cracks. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: The desk arrived on time but the box that was labeled hardware did not contain any of the hardware required to do the assembly. It's very frustrating that my son has been waiting for this desk only to have it be unusable due to poor quality control by the company. I will change this review if the company corrects the deficiency but as it stands, it is just a bunch of separate parts so cannot be evaluated as a desk.
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 package delivered, should've been 2 pcs per picture and listing
customer_reviews.text: Per the picture and listing description "Walker Edison Modern Corner L Shaped Glass Computer Writing Gaming Gamer Command Center Workstation Desk Home Office, Set of 2, Black", I was supposed to get 2 pcs of L desk. However, only 1 pc was delivered. Contacted customer service, only option is to return or refund half of desk. This is unfair to customer with deception.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crappie Tools
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard track did not properly line up, so it’s on put that part can’t pull out without getting off track. The pictures on the instruction don’t show you how to do the center piece. I originally it it on upside down once I it the class on I realized it. Unable to correct it because on of the bolts got stripped trying to change it. I was able to do something to make that middle part stable.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh T

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product at a great price. Amazon Prime Rocks! Ultra fast delivery by UPS. PACKAGING...... totally incredible and awesome packaging. Arrived in one large box. All items were clearly marked in accordance with the instruction sheet. No damaged or missing parts. Each part was individually wrapped in protective foam. ASSEMBLY..... fast and easy assembly in about an hour with one Phillips head screwdriver and the enclosed Allan wrench. All parts fit properly and completed assembly feels sturdy. QUALITY..... Absolutely fantastic quality, especially for the price. CONCLUSION...... I am extremely happy with this product and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a good quality computer desk at a really great price.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur M.

customer_reviews.title: Product was partially defective but over all decent desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: The desk looks very nice for the price and works. Luckily, I was not planning on using the keyboard rack, but based on the instructions it looks like we were missing the keyboard part so we were unable to install it. Won't return because that's a pain and I really need the desk and don't want to have to wait for a new one. Overall good item if you get everything you are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Ashattack365

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk due to working from home. I’ve a 1 bedroom apt and was concerned about space but it’s perfect. The only thing that got me was that the steps in the instructions weren’t really clear to me on how to assemble the keyboard tray...3 star rating. I found out how by checking YouTube and finished assembly soon after. Not a planned purchase but am glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price. Support bar is a bit odd but can be fixed.
customer_reviews.text: The build is very sturdy, the look is very attractive. The glass definitely will not break as long as you don’t tighten the leg supports together while squeezing the glass top. I definitely recommend it for a good and affordable desk with enough options to suit your needs. The support bars down by your knees are definitely a bit strange but if you find a way to tighten them down on the bottom bar of the legs then you can just rest your feet on them and have the same support for a bit more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good starter desk, but looking to upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent desk. Everything has held up for 3+ years now. For my next desk I will definitely be going for a wood countertop and a deeper top. Fitting a monitor stand + mouse mat is a struggle since the top is only 19.5in deep.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn T. Mcdonough

customer_reviews.title: Great corner desk
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy. The glass is tempered and smudge resistant. The instructions were detailed, but look at the pictures closely so that you don't have to take things apart because the suction cups are not positioned properly. There is enough leg room under the desk so your not racking your shins against the cross members. The only issue is that you might need a mouse pad since optical mice do not like glass. I thought that because it was black versus clear glass that this would help, but it didn't. My yoga mouse and razor gaming mouse both have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Owens

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect for adding to a bedroom or any other work-from-home space - the glass/metal materials keep the space bright and it's compact size is just enough to get work done. PRO • materials keep light coming in, so what would be a dark corner is still well lit • it's compact size means it was an easy addition to my bedroom to make it into a bedroom/office • the price can't be beat CON • wobbles a bit, which can be distracting/annoying • it's compact size means it's just enough for a laptop and a notebook, that's about it. If you are thinking of using an external monitor you might want a larger desk
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to install keyboard tray
customer_reviews.text: This desk is fine, but installing the keyboard tray is either impossible or just not clearly explained whatsoever in the instructions. I purchased this desk to use the tray and I haven't been able to figure out how to install the back screws on the slide out arms. Customer service is non-existent and therefore I'm left without the one thing I need for this desk. Also, asking the community for advice here hasn't produced a single useful answer. Hoping that leaving this review might give me an answer. PS, if you want to contact their customer support (good luck with a response) you can reach them at: service@walkeredison.com.
customer_reviews.author: N. Solish

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly Wobbler
customer_reviews.text: Wobbly junk. Monitor base I bought doesn't have level feet that I bought from Amazon. This desk makes it even worse because the desk shifts around so much I have to swing my head back and forth with my monitor just to read the text. Screws are all tight it's just not a very stable desk. It looks nice and it works, but don't expect a solid piece of equipment at this price. I'm pretty disappointed myself. I'd try to return it, but it would be a hassle to disassemble and repack.
customer_reviews.author: Beastykato

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in 2017 and still works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk in 2017. Sometimes I had it as what was in the picture. Other times, I had so other stuff (heavy hard cover text books, papers, plants) including my main picture. It never broke on me. So, if you wanna buy this for college students, it works great. Not sure about other purposes because I bought this for college. It still works great in 2020. Assemble is possible with one person, but it would be helpful to have an additional 1 or 2 hands on deck. Just in case it's important, I never rested my feet on the lower rails, even though it's so tempting.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk, though it was a real pain getting the glass top to match up with the other glass pieces. Fits both of my monitors with some nice extra room for anything I might need. Though..... the keyboard tray is a little sticky and doesn’t move in and out smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Kodi Awoo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk and the it very functional for a busy person always on the computer. You have alot of room and it was very easy to install. My sliding keyboard holder would not get tight no matter how much I screwed it so I left it and it fell right off. I put it back on and it fell off again. that was the only problem I had so now I don't have a keyboard holder underneath the desk so the keyboard sits on the top of the desk. Pissed about the keyboard holder but the desk is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Paschall

customer_reviews.title: Hours of product research led me here - Not disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: To start, I bought the White Soreno desk and it has to be one of my best buys on amazon. Hands down. Great quality, sturdy, sleek, and fits in my small apartment nicely. This desk will lighten any room with its minimal design. I personally put in hours of research on every product before I buy, This desk is the real deal. Assembly was a cake and it came with clear instructions. However, be careful when opening the package! there will be tons of styrofoam! Honestly that didn't bother me too much, because it ensured that these glass pieces were protected. Overall, I am extremely happy with this desk. No regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No place to put your legs
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a tall person at all, but when i started using this desk more when working from home I found that if I was properly pushed in to use the keyboard on the desk instead of the sliding shelf (too low for me) that my shins are right up against the back bracing bar and bashing there constantly, I had to get a new desk as soon as i started trying to do any sort of real work from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED, Bought a Second!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a simular glass corner desk for many years, didn't think the glass would last... but it has! I bought this one to enlarge my office surface area and assembly was easy, packaging was excellent AND the makers added one extra part for each part! A company that adds extras tells me they want to make it right the first time and will spent a little extra $$ doing so! I am impressed! Ordering another one to have matching black desks! Note, the glass is painted black, not smoked glass.
customer_reviews.author: Papillon

customer_reviews.title: Great Table and good size for small and big men ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Table and good size for small and big men or women. Pros: - Perfect height for all sizes. - Looks nice. - Strong - Easily movable. - Not that heavy. Cons: - It shakes a little bit. - If you are a big man the drawer is not that useful. - A bit confusing to build and might have to rebuild some parts if you don't pay very close attention to the pictures and make sure you place them the right direction. All in all, I would buy it again in a heart beat if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: DaPope

customer_reviews.title: Tempered glass shattered !!
customer_reviews.text: This morning the tempered glass just shattered to a million pieces .. The only reason I can think of is that my 11 yr old left the laptop on whole night and the heat from it was the reason !! Poor quality tempered glass !! To amazons credit they promptly agreed to send a replacement desk , but am still skeptical about the glass !!
customer_reviews.author: Kedar

customer_reviews.title: Would I Buy Again? Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I like this 3 piece desk set... However, there's an issue with the keyboard area it is too small to fit a keyboard and mouse and its weird to game with the keyboard below and the mouse on top. So I have to use the top portion of the desk for my mouse and keyboard which causes me to have to raise my seat up high. Its a little awkward at times because I am a short woman. Luckily my monitor is adjustable. Would I buy it again? The answer is yes because it is very sturdy and unmovable after you put it together. And...there is space for my monitor, laptop, iPad Pro and other desk accessories.
customer_reviews.author: OC

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: I needed a desk to expand my work space horizontally. It's the perfect size for me. I'm 5'5". The keyboard tray is the size for a standard keyboard. A mouse will not fit beside it. I'm not sure of the weight the tempered glass holds, but I don't have much in one space. Everything is spread out. It's sleek, perfect size for a medium sized home office. I assembled it myself, using the instructions. The keyboard tray was tricky for me but I figured it out. I would recommend this desk to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Detra Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good size desk overall. Wish it stood higher. I have to lower my chair to the lowest setting and still struggle for leg room and I’m only 5’5”. The glass pops out easy and you will need 2-3 people to move it anytime you want it moved or it will push apart. I work from home so I’d prefer something bigger. But I’d buy it again for my kids rather than me if given the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Xoxoitsme

customer_reviews.title: Lower than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The product is advertised as being 29 inches tall, when in all actuality it is only 28.5, and that makes a big difference. It's not going to be comfortable if you are close to 1.80 m (whatever that is in feet), or taller. There goes the first star. Also, the keyboard tray is less than functional, since, besides being too low, it doesn't come out the whole way, making it difficult to accomodate the keyboard and type in it, making it more of an ornamentary feature. That's the second star penalization. On the bright side, it has nice looks, it's easy to assemble, and has an overall good quality manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for about 2 and a half years. I could have used an inch or two more in leg room, but I like to hike my legs up on the metal pieces. So I just removes the keyboard shelf and it's perfect for me. Removing it hasnt affected stability. It's survived a move, I keep a decent amount of heavy items on it, and have even dropped things on top of it a couple times from a few inches high (scissors,my tablet).
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it but had to hire someone to build it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great desk looks awesome and does exactly what I wanted it to do. Nice and sturdy doesn’t sway at all. I only give 4 stars because I did have to adjust some things to get the glass to fit as it wasn’t 100% square on one side. No big deal loosened the screws all up slid the glass in and tightened everything down slowly. Glass isn’t going anywhere now. Otherwise great desk easy to assemble and looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a glass desk for my daughter for a small space and this one is PERFECT! It looks nice and doesn't take up a lot of room. In fact, it's so perfect I ordered a 2nd one for my sons room. I highly recommend this desk!
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great corner modern glass desk for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love my desk! I had seen another desk at Office Depot dame design but it was larger and more money. I saw this desk and knew I could get same look but better because the size of this desk is more appropriate for my space. I gave it 4 stars and not 5 because the corner glass piece did not align properly with the two halves during assembly. It’s a little off but the desk still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Benz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and durable. Black is so hard to keep clean tho lol. Wish the side leg of the desk was about a foot longer for a printer and laptop with my dual screen setup.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a tall person
customer_reviews.text: It’s a desk. Has too many flaws to be useable. -Can barely get my legs under it at 6’ tall -sliding tray only holds my keyboard, barely. Mouse will not fit -I have to look down to see my monitor and it’s 32” L-shaped part of it is cool but no room for you desktop computer to sit
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: It’s a sturdy but low to the ground desk
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it’s a good desk. But it’s so short and I am exhausted with sitting this low to the ground. I also feel like the pull out keyboard / mouse area is super low/awkward to use. Need to upgrade after 2 years. But the desk itself is still in great condition, so I’ll sell it.
customer_reviews.author: King/Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with damaged parts, please see images
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with broken parts that look forced on by the people that manufactured this part of the desk. This plastic piece is not at all touched by the end user/purchaser. I will update this review when seller helps me get the replacement parts and fixes this Issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joel V

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk.  Could use help with securing keyboard glass
customer_reviews.text: I like the desk very much. However when installing the keyboard I noticed that the glass would not stay secured. 1 week after I set it up, my knee hit the keyboard and the glass fell out. The glass is only secured by 4 small suction cups so of course it would. Now I must replace keyboard glass (or not) but probably will happen again. Overall very sturdy desk.
customer_reviews.author: Just the truth

customer_reviews.title: Super wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Sure the table looks nice and it's easy to assemble. But if you are planning on using it for anything at all, then it sucks. Simply placing my hand on it makes it wobble. And if my laptop is on it and I'm typing, it's basically shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple use type people.
customer_reviews.text: I love this setup for my dual monitor situation and bluetooth keyboard. I works really well and looks super fly! I have My computer setup on the tray side and ps4 with 4k monitor on the right. I love the switch. The bottom had a desktop holster, I use it for my subwoofer. I love the placement and everything about it so far. When you put it together look at the pics super indepth, That was the only thing I did not like about this was putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Garret JV

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Modern Corner L Shaped Glass Computer Writing Gaming Gamer Command Center Workstation Desk Home Office, Single, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:Single Desk| Style:SorenoUpdate your home office or study with this modern and sleek corner computer desk. Crafted from durable steel with a powder-coated finish and thick, tempered safety glass. The L-shape design provides the perfect fit for space-saving needs and features a sliding keyboard tray and unattached CPU stand. Its flexible configuration allows you to mount the tray on either side of the desk according to your needs. This contemporary l-shaped office desk gives you plenty of table space to place your computer on one side, with the other side left for décor or organizing your office supplies.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 29" H x 51" L x 20" W
Join two desks for even more game space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,492 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
